- [ ] _What will be created or happen as a result of this story?_

---
## How to configure this issue
- [ ] **Attached to a Milestone** (when will this be completed?)
- [ ] **Attached to an Epic** (what body of work is this a part of?)
- [ ] **Labeled with Team** (`vsa-authenticated-exp`)
- [ ] **Labeled with Practice Area** (`backend`, `frontend`, `devops`, `design`, `research`, `product`, `ia`, `qa`, `analytics`, `contact center`, `research`, `accessibility`, `content`)
- [ ] **Labeled with Project** (`onsite-notifications`, `My VA`, etc.)
- [ ] **Add Assignees** (who will do this work?)
- [ ] **Add effort** (or needs-grooming tag)
